entries.title: Former All-Star third baseman Sal Bando dies at 78
entries.description: Sal Bando, a three-time World Series champion with the Oakland Athletics and former Milwaukee Brewers executive, has died

entries.title: Top Biden aide Ron Klain expected to soon leave White House
entries.description: White House chief of staff Ron Klain is preparing to leave in the coming weeks

entries.title: WATCH:  'Fireball' streaks through Oklahoma sky
entries.description: Multiple people across parts of Oklahoma reported seeing a "fireball" light up the sky along with hearing a loud boom in the early morning hours.

entries.title: Subpoena granted in Reno mayor's suit over tracking device
entries.description: Mayor wants P.I. to identify who wanted a tracking device on her vehicle.

entries.title: Missouri inmates remove sink, climb through wall to freedom
entries.description: Authorities are piecing together how five inmates escaped from a Missouri jail.

entries.title: WATCH:  Drone shows moose shedding antlers in forest
entries.description: A wildlife enthusiast's drone captured the moment a moose shed both its antlers in a forest in Canada.

entries.title: A deeper look at what drives some husbands to kill their wives
entries.description: The psychology behind why some husbands kill their wives instead of getting a divorce.

entries.title: Brazil’s right-wing movement persists without Bolsonaro
entries.description: Hw was in Florida when his supporters tried to overthrow the country’s democracy

entries.title: 2 Minnesota brothers investigated in TikTok gambling scheme
entries.description: Two men allegedly ran a TikTok gambling scheme in the state's casinos.

entries.title: Elizabeth Holmes bought one-way ticket to Mexico, prosecutors say
entries.description: Prosecutors have alleged that Elizabeth Holmes bought a one-way ticket to Mexico after her fraud conviction.

entries.title: WATCH:  Cat can't wait to get back inside after being out in the snow
entries.description: Butters the cat hurried back inside after winter weather blanketed central Colorado in snow.

entries.title: Sections of Balkan river become floating garbage dump
entries.description: Tons of waste dumped in poorly regulated riverside landfills or directly into the waterways that flow across three countries end up accumulating in the Drina River in eastern Bosnia during wet weather

entries.title: German caution on Ukraine arms rooted in political culture
entries.description: Germany has become one of Ukraine’s leading weapons suppliers in the 11 months since Russia’s invasion, but Chancellor Olaf Scholz also has gained a reputation for hesitating to take each new step — generating impatience among allies

entries.title: She made history as Chicago mayor. Reelection may be harder
entries.description: Lori Lightfoot made history four years ago as the first Black woman and first openly gay person to serve as Chicago mayor

entries.title: Illegal border crossings surge to highest of Biden's term
entries.description: Authorities say a surge in Cuban and Nicaraguan arrivals at the U.S. border with Mexico in December led to the highest number of illegal border crossings recorded during any month of Joe Biden’s presidency

entries.title: San Diego County to pay $12M over beating and stun gun death
entries.description: San Diego County will pay $12 million to settle a lawsuit by the family of a man who died after he was beaten, shocked with a stun gun and hogtied by sheriff’s deputies in 2015

entries.title: 5 officers fired over death of Tyre Nichols
entries.description: The Memphis Police Department announced that it terminated five officers over the death of a Black man during a traffic stop.

entries.title: Indigenous tribe’s river name to be restored under proposed bill
entries.description: A Connecticut state representative wants to honor the Pequot tribe by restoring their name to the Thames River.
